price: Vyongeye, sinzi rero kumbure ko itenyenya ku bihano mwihutira gusaba ko vyoshika, harimwo igeragezwa kuri mwebwe kugira muryoherwe gato mu buzima bwo kw’isi, maze mubandanye mugarariza, gutyo muzohabwe ibihano ruhasha".
arabic: وَإِنۡ أَدۡرِي لَعَلَّهُۥ فِتۡنَةٞ لَّكُمۡ وَمَتَٰعٌ إِلَىٰ حِينٖ

meta.transliteration: wa-in adrī laʿallahu fit'natun lakum wamatāʿun ilā ḥīnin
